name: Baby Bubble Bird
description:
Baby Bubble Bird Shooter Bubble Pop Bubble Birds style game. Bubble bird pop from the makers of Bubble Blossom and Baby Witch.

Bubble Bird squirrel need your help to rescue baby bubble birds trapped inside bubbles by Dark Lord. Travel the realm, pass your way through jungle, beach, desert, snow by popping bubbles in this exciting Baby Bubble Bird adventure. Win levels and free all baby birds. Match3 or more bubbles of same color to burst.

Peacock, Chicken, Lion, Frog, Penguin, Panda, Turtle are there to support you but beware of those poisonous rattle snake. Work your way through increasingly challenging levels and employ the power of the elements to help you in your Baby Bubble quest. Bubble-bursting powerups will help you free the birds !!!

FEATURES:
★ 1200+ levels with uniquely challenging obstacles
★ More levels added every two weeks
★ Stunning graphics & adorable animations
★ Addicting pace & rewarding progression
★ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
★ Google Play Achievements with lots of XPs.
★ Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
★ Free & easy to play, challenging to master
★ Available to play on mobile and tablet devices
